bot_response:
Here are the available commands:
- 'info': Learn about Digital Literacy.
- 'security': Get online security tips.
- 'quiz': Test your knowledge.
- 'agri': Info on agriculture schemes.
- 'health': Info on health schemes.
- 'skills': Info on education initiatives.
- 'sanitation': Learn about sanitation.
- 'emergency': Get helpline numbers.
- 'digital_india': About the initiative.
- 'make_in_india': About the initiative.
- 'joke': Get a random joke.
- 'image': Generate an image (simulation).
- 'time': Get the current time.
- 'date': Get today's date.
- 'weather': Get the weather in Lucknow.
- 'creator': See who made this chatbot.
